name: Get Going
description:
Controls

WASD /Arrow keys - Move around

Bump into things and people to interact

Make sure to speak to all characters whenever you did something to get their full stories.

Story

You are at a bus stop and your bus has broken down. All the passengers have their problems, but for some reason you are the only one doing something about it. As always. Lazy NPCs!

Background

Created for the Public Transport Bitsy Jam.

This turned out to be my first completed game. I was going to make a Ren'Py title my first published project, but then the jam came along and I gave Bitsy a shot.
